title: A.E. Irakleio F.C
text:
A.E. Irakleio F.C is a <a href="Greece">Greek</a> <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club, based in <a href="Irakleio%2C%20Attica">Irakleio</a>, <a href="Attica%20%28region%29">Attica</a>.
The club was founded in 1929. They will play in <a href="Gamma%20Ethniki">Gamma Ethniki</a> for the season 2015–16.
